name: insuppressible
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
If something is insuppressible, you find it impossible to prevent it from happening or being seen: She headed towards the exit with an insuppressible smile. I had an insuppressible urge to redecorate the bathroom in bright pink.
More examplesFewer examplesI suddenly felt an insuppressible urge to cry. Every time I hear this song I experience an insuppressible desire to get up and dance. The view across the bay from the top of this hill always fills me with insuppressible joy.
